Abstract: Article on upcoming bowl games notes that Sugar Bowl between Florida State and Virginia Tech will decide national title; Virginia Tech Coach Frank Beamer photo (M)
Snippet: Article on upcoming bowl games notes that Sugar Bowl between Florida State and Virginia Tech will decide national title; Virginia Tech Coach Frank Beamer photo (M)
LeadParagraph: They are the first college football matchups of the 21st century, these eight remaining bowl games. All of them promise to be entertaining, but only one will decide the national title: the Sugar Bowl on Tuesday night.

Headline.Main: Sugar Adds the Spice To the Bowl Season
Headline.PrintHeadline: COLLEGE FOOTBALL; Sugar Adds the Spice To the Bowl Season
